decision_conditions:
<p>Notwithstanding the proposals shown in the plans provided as part of this 
application, detailed drawings (including sections and elevations), specifications, 
or samples of materials as appropriate in respect of the following shall be agreed 
in writing by the local planning authority before the relevant part of the work is 
begun for:
</p><ul><li>a) rainwater goods
</li><li>b) roof tiles
</li><li>c) baths, toilets, shower and kitchen units </li><li>d) design (ie fixings, materials and any roof) for the electrical 
cupboard </li><li>e) lighting. </li><li>f) alcove </li><li>g) brickwork and pointing above new external door </li><li>h) brickwork and pointing around circular windows, including trial 
areas </li><li>I) Gablet details </li><li>J) High level circular windows (their required removal and 
replacement with those matching the originals).</li></ul><p>The works shall be completed in accordance with the approved details and shall 
be retained thereafter.</p><p>
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the listed building.</p>

<p>A full list and photo sheet of historic features that have been unfixed, 
unattached or removed from the listed building, but remain in 
existence on site or otherwise, is to be submitted to, and approved in 
writing by, the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of 
any like for like replacement works, to ensure these items are reused 
and not replaced. 
Reason: To preserve the special interest of the listed building.</p>

<p>If previously unknown evidence is discovered about historic character which 
would be affected by the works hereby granted, an appropriate record, together 
with recommendations for dealing with it in the context of the scheme, shall be 
approved in writing by the local planning authority before any of the permitted 
works are begun.
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the listed building.</p>

<p>Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, the position, type and manner of 
installation of all new and relocated services (including pipes, soil vent pipes or 
air admittance valves) and related fittings shall be adequately specified in 
advance of any work being carried out, and the prior written approval of the local 
planning authority shall be obtained wherever these installations are to be visible 
or where ducts or other methods of concealment are proposed. The works shall 
be completed in accordance with the approved details and retained thereafter.
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the listed building.</p>

<p>Suitable precautions shall be taken to secure and protect interior features against 
accidental loss or damage during the building work hereby granted, and no such 
features may be disturbed or removed, temporarily or permanently, except as 
indicated on the approved plans.
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the listed building.</p>

<p>Historic fixtures and fittings shall be retained and, where already lost, reinstated 
like for like as part of this proposal, including external locks to the external doors, 
and retained in situ thereafter.
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the listed building.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Prior to the reinstatement of the first floor fireplace and fire surround, detailed 
plans, elevations and sections to a scale of 1:10 or 1:20 based on photographic 
evidence, and a sample are to be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the 
Local Planning Authority prior to the relevant part of the work. The works shall be 
completed in accordance with the approved details and shall be retained 
thereafter.
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the Listed Building.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, no historic fabric (including that to 
the ground floor stable doors) shall be removed from the listed former coach 
house and stables unless evidence by a suitable conservation specialist is 
provided to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority prior to the 
commencement of the relevant parts of the works and replacement shall be like 
for like in relation to the original.
REASON: To preserve the special interest of the Listed Building.&nbsp;</p>

<p>The proposed works hereby permitted shall be completed in full within 18 months 
of the date of this consent and retained in place thereafter.
REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed 
Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.</p>
description: Listed Building Consent: Internal and External Alterations to Grade II Listed Coach House and Stables and Associated Curtilage Listed Buildings Including Ice House and Smithy (Part Retrospective)
